title: New Year's Eve Masquerade Party
description:
There's no diguising this good time! Join us as we toast 2017 with a New Year's Eve Masquerade party. Dance the night away on two dynamic floors of music: Soul People at Prairie Fire and DJ beats at Prospect. Your ticket also includes a midnight buffet and champagne toast. The 1st 50 people to arrive will receive a complimentary masquerade mask.
TICKETS :: $20 pre-sale, $30 at the door

UP ALL NIGHT, SLEEP ALL DAY
Room Packages starting at $250 Include: 2 tickets to the NYE Masquerade, bottle of champagne, complimentary valet and late checkout

HELLO 2017
Wake up to a Champagne Brunch at Belvedere Room from 9am to 2pm - $39/person. Reservations are recommended - 661.427.4900
